src:
Trump quiere incursión en México para usarla con fines electorales: Reyes Orona | Entérate
 by Redacción AN / AL



Gabriel Reyes Orona, exprocurador fiscal, afirmó que el presidente Donald Trump quiere una incursión punitiva en México para aprovecharla con fines electorales, aunque la masacre a la familia LeBarón es competencia exclusiva de México, así como el ataque en El Paso solo es investigado por Estados Unidos.
text:
Trump wants a foray into Mexico to use it for electoral purposes: Reyes Orona | Find out
 by AN / AL Writing



Gabriel Reyes Orona, former prosecutor, said that President Donald Trump wants a punitive incursion into Mexico to take advantage of it for electoral purposes, although the massacre of the LeBarón family is the exclusive competence of Mexico, just as the attack in El Paso is only investigated by States United.
